{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Shuffleboard {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Shuffleboard Shuffleboard , more precisely deck shuffleboard , and also known as floor shuffleboard , is a game in which players use cues to push weighted discs, sending them gliding down a narrow court, with the purpose of having them come to rest within a marked scoring area. As a more generic term, it refers to the family of shuffleboard-variant games as a whole. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shuffleboard)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
